prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (colossal Russian wrestler:1.3), massive beard and chest hair, muscular physique, intense expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin wrinkles and pores, (realistic coarse body hair texture:1.3), (realistic scar tissue detail:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fabric on trunks:1.2), cinematic arena lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, baby face, blurry beard, low quality, (no hair:1.4)
